The plant has a delicate, ribbon-like structure with a distinct leaf arrangement and a simple thallus. Its reproductive structures, including the antheridia and archegonia, are located on the upper surface of the gametophyte. Antherotoma gracilis plays a role in nutrient cycling and provides microhabitats for various invertebrates in its ecosystem.
